name: Waffle with Berries
alt: Waffles topped with sliced strawberries and powdered sugar, surrounded by bowls of blueberries and strawberries, and a cup of coffee.

name: Vanilla Bean Crème Brûlée
alt: Two oval dishes of crème brûlée garnished with fig slices, mint sprigs, and red currants, placed on a round red plate with gold-colored spoons and decorative orange berries.

name: Macaron Mix of Five
alt: Five colorful macarons arranged on a white background, with the pink macaron partially eaten and crumbs scattered around it.

name: Classic Tiramisu
alt: A breakfast setting with a bowl of cereal and milk, a plate with a fork, and a small bowl of raspberries on a yellow surface.

name: Pistachio Baklava
alt: A white plate with three baklava stacked on it, placed on a gray polka-dotted placemat. To the left of the plate, there is a spoon with a decorative blue handle.

name: Lemon Meringue Pie
alt: A slice of pie on a black plate, garnished with whipped cream and pumpkin seeds. A gold-colored fork is placed on the left side of the pie slice, and a gold-colored knife is below the plate. The plate is surrounded by star anise and a small bowl of pumpkin seeds on a rustic-textured background.

name: Red Velvet Cake
alt: A beautifully decorated red velvet cake with a layer of white cream and fresh strawberries. The cake is garnished with red velvet crumbs and topped with a whole strawberry, presented in an appealing manner.

name: Salted Caramel Brownie
alt: A square piece of chocolate brownie topped with a scoop of vanilla ice cream and a nutty topping. The dessert is drizzled with chocolate sauce and served on a white plate. There is a cup of tea or coffee and some green foliage in the background, and the plate is placed on a wooden surface with small decorative items like seashells around it.

name: Vanilla Panna Cotta
alt: Two jars of dessert placed on a white surface. The jar in the foreground contains a layered dessert with a greenish-blue base, topped with whipped cream and small pieces of red fruit. The jar in the background contains a dessert with a white base, possibly chia pudding, topped with red fruit and granola. A spoon is placed on the surface next to the jars, and the background includes two small glass bottles with dried flowers.
